compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/paulo/UFRJ/ApplicationBandeGO/serv.serviceRawFile:
service: bandego

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
            - dynamodb:BatchGetItem
            - dynamodb:BatchWriteItem
          Resource:
            - "arn:aws:dynamodb:${aws:region}:${aws:accountId}:table/${self:service}-data-table"
            - "arn:aws:dynamodb:${aws:region}:${aws:accountId}:table/${self:service}-iot-data/index/*" # Permissão para GSIs

functions:
  newImage:
    handler: /src/newImage/index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /newImage
          method: post
    environment:
      DATA_TABLE: data-table
  getCount:
    handler: /src/getCount/index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /getCount
          method: get
    environment:
      DATA_TABLE: data-table

resources:
  Resources:
    DataTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:service}-data-table
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
    ImageBucket:
      Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
      Properties:
        BucketName: ${self:service}-image-bucket

compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
